Install saspy Module

Source: R/utils.R
install_saspy.Rd

Install saspy module in reticulate.

Usage 

install_saspy(method = "auto", conda = "auto")

Arguments

method

(character)
method to install saspy.

conda

(character)
path to conda executable.

Value

No return value.
